author: Staff Reporter
text:
A toll-free number-18004257021- was launched here recently to enable the public as well as members of political parties to make any election related complaints.

Control room

District Election Officer and Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy said that an election control room has been set up at the District Collectorate. Members of the public can call the toll-free number and register their complaints.

The service is available round-the-clock and the complaints would be registered and forwarded to the election official concerned. He said that so far three complaints have been received.

Returning officers: Rasipuram – N. Balasubramaniam, District Supply and Consumer Protection Officer (94450-00232); Senthamangalam – N. Balachandran, Special Deputy Collector, SSS (94454-61743); Namakkal – Kannan, Revenue Divisional Officer, (94450-00431); Paramathi Velur – Ramakrishnan, District Backward Classes and Minorities Welfare Officer (97862-22375); Tiruchengode – G. Mahatma, Revenue Divisional Officer (94450-00432), and Kumarapalayam – K.S. Murali Krishnan, District Adi Dravidar Welfare Officer (94862-43976).
title: Toll-free number to receive complaints
